org.gbif.ws.server.guice

Class GbifServletListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
      • org.gbif.ws.server.guice.GbifServletListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public abstract class GbifServletListener
extends com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
    A basic servlet listener for all our webservices. Note that the request filters will be ordered as follows if provided:
    1. The default filters will always be first
    2. The authentication filter will be next if enabled (installAuth=true)
    3. The provided filters will be last in the given order

    • Constructor Detail

      • GbifServletListener

        protected GbifServletListener(Properties properties,
                   String resourcePackages,
                   boolean installAuthenticationFilters)
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to load
        resourcePackages - packages to scan for jersey resources, for example "org.gbif.registry.ws,org.gbif.registry.common.ws"
        installAuthenticationFilters - if true installs support for authentication. Requires an implementation of UserService to be installed by one of the additional modules.

      • GbifServletListener

        protected GbifServletListener(Properties properties,
                   String resourcePackages,
                   boolean installAuthenticationFilters,
                   @Nullable
                   List<Class<? extends com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerResponseFilter>> responseFilters)
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to load
        resourcePackages - packages to scan for jersey resources, for example "org.gbif.registry.ws,org.gbif.registry.common.ws"
        installAuthenticationFilters - if true installs support for authentication. Requires an implementation of UserService to be installed by one of the additional modules.
        responseFilters - A list of response filters that are applied to the requests.

      • GbifServletListener

        protected GbifServletListener(Properties properties,
                   String resourcePackages,
                   boolean installAuthenticationFilters,
                   @Nullable
                   List<Class<? extends com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerResponseFilter>> responseFilters,

                   List<Class<? extends com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerRequestFilter>> requestFilters)
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to load
        resourcePackages - packages to scan for jersey resources, for example "org.gbif.registry.ws,org.gbif.registry.common.ws"
        installAuthenticationFilters - if true installs support for authentication. Requires an implementation of UserService to be installed by one of the additional modules.
        responseFilters - A list of response filters that are applied to the requests.
        requestFilters - A list of request filters that are applied to the requests. Note: read constructor documentation on WsJerseyModule

    • Method Detail

      • getModules

        protected abstract List<com.google.inject.Module> getModules(Properties properties)
        Implement this to return the list of all additional modules needed to be installed.
        Returns:
        a list of modules, never null.

      • getPolymorphicClassMap

        protected Map<Class<?>,Class<?>> getPolymorphicClassMap()
        The Jackson JSON configuration needs to know about how to (de)serialize polymorphic classes. Override this method to pass a map of mixIn classes into the Jackson context resolver.
        Returns:
        the mixIn class map. Defaults to an empty map.
